About

We are a team with focus on Quality Deliverables.
We help organizations to streamline their processes through technology and grow together.
We make sure to provide high quality services and help clients to know what is best for them.

8 Bits Code is based in Stockholm, Sweden with motive to provide best consulting services.
We aim to build long-term relationship with our clients.

Services

We aim to help our clients with variety of technical services and skilled people.

Software Development

We provide experienced and highly skilled Software Engineers and Architects to help you achieve your business goals.

Project Management

Our Project Management team comprises of experienced Project Managers, Product Owners and Scrum Masters. They work as a team and make sure to meet project budget, timeline and highlight and mitigate risks.

Consulting

Our consultants supports client by delivering sustainable software programs. They always take responsibility to deliver what is best for clients.

Development Services
